J

Java8CompositeHandler.RowListQueryHandler - Interface in acolyte.jdbc
A query handler whose result is a list of row.
Java8CompositeHandler.ScalarQueryHandler<T> - Interface in acolyte.jdbc
A query handler whose result is a single row with a single value.
